description: The 43-year-old actress arrived at LAX airport on Thursday after a romantic getaway with her 44-year-old boyfriend where she wore the latest chic couture but skipped the heels and went for comfort
title: Gwyneth Paltrow arrives home after Paris getaway with Brad Falchuk
title_page: Gwyneth Paltrow arrives home after Paris getaway with Brad Falchuk | Daily Mail Online
text:
She wore the latest chic couture during her romantic getaway in Paris.
But Gwyneth Paltrow ditched the heels and went for comfort as she arrived at LAX airport on Wednesday.
The 43-year-old actress wore wide-legged denim jeans, a cosy blue sweater and basic white tee for her flight back to Los Angeles.
Scroll down for video
Casual chic: Gwyneth Paltrow, 43, ditched the heels and went for comfort as she arrived at LAX airport on Wednesday
The Iron Man starlet accessorized her ensemble with white sneakers and carried a royal blue designer handbag.
Paltrow's boyfriend Brad Falchuk, 44, followed closely behind the starlet as he hauled most of the luggage.
Going for comfort: The Iron Man actress wore wide-legged denim jeans, a cosy blue sweater and basic white tee for her flight back to Los Angeles
Gwyneth and her TV producer-writer beau have been enjoying the sites of the city of love on their break.
The couple enjoyed a whirlwind trip to Paris to also take in the latest fashions at the Haute Couture shows.
But before anything, the lovebirds made sure to wine and dine on some of the famed French cuisine in the capital.
Undercover: The Oscar winner tried to keep concealed behind dark shades and let her signature blonde locks falls across her face in an attempt to remain disguised
Lugging the luggage: Paltrow's boyfriend Brad Falchuk, 44, followed closely behind the starlet as he hauled most of the luggage
The pair were seen going for a dinner date at Dome in Montparnasse, located in the 14th arrondissement on Sunday evening.
On Monday the Oscar Award-winning actress posted a snap of herself and her man taking photos from the roof of the Pompidou Centre art gallery.
She captioned it: 'The view from the top of the #centrepompidou is at least as stunning as the art contained within its walls. What a glorious place. #parisjetaime.'
Romantic rendevouz: Gwyneth and her TV producer-writer beau have been enjoying the sites of the city of love on their break
